author: Kamran Rahman
title: Mnuchin: Virus task force unanimously shunned Trump's quarantine idea
description: Public health experts have criticized the idea of instituting statewide quarantines in “hot spots” like New York.
content:
Treasury Secretary Steve Mnuchin. | Patrick Semansky/AP Photo
The White House Coronavirus Task Force unanimously shunned President Donald Trumps suggestion of a quarantine in the New York City area, Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said Sunday.
